Reviews.Title: Excelente Telefono, Exelent Phone
Reviews.Author: OrlandoQ
Reviews.Content: El telefono si viene Liberado para poder ser usado con cualquier linea telefonica, actualmente lo estoy utilizando en venezuela y funciona a la perfeccion. recomendado!The cellphone is unlocked, and can be used with any sim card! actually im using it in venezuela! and all run fine!

Reviews.Title: All that you need at your finger tips
Reviews.Author: P. Mouttet
Reviews.Content: This phone was for my sister. Picked the color based mostly on price but turned out to be a great choice as the color is not very common in Trinidad so my sister is very happy with her choice of phone and color.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good purchase
Reviews.Author: Fernando Diaz "Josh!"
Reviews.Content: I got my phone brand new 100 unlocked as I expected... I'm rating 4 stars for three reasons:1. the wall charger came with 2 plug ins to complete the charger... way too impractical...!Otherwise it came with the CD, USB cable, brand new battery, and a 2gb micro SD etc...2. NO HEADPHONES!3. If you're going to get a data plan with the phone... get it... if you're planning to use this with a wifi connection... don't... the browser and the download speed sucks... even when your wifi network works fine on other devices...despite all that.. the phone is great! and I bought it really cheap here... amazon was the seller... $170!!!

Reviews.Title: Super satisfied
Reviews.Author: Edilias
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled, especially with this purchase, is a product used but it seems not. It came with charger, USB cable and headphones. Seems not used. Here in Venezuela costs expensive and I got a bargain buy in this way. Amazon provides an excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: Buena compra! después de un año funciona perfecto, y aun se encuentra en buenas condiciones, quedó totalmente conforme con la compra y lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: RECIBIDO
Reviews.Author: Adelis Alvarado
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE VENDEDOR REALIZARE MAS COMPRAS EN EL FUTURO, QUEDE SATISFECHO CON EL PRODUCTO Y HARE RECOMENDACIONES A TODOS LOS AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: Cumplió mis expectativas
Reviews.Author: Jhofran Yepez
Reviews.Content: Cumplió absolutamente todas mis espectativas, llegó en excelentes condiciones a pesar de que lo adquirí en la fecha del problema del Huracán Sandy y me advirtieron que la compra se podía ver afectada lo cuál no sucedió, estoy satisfecho, excelente...!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Vixky
Reviews.Content: I've purchased cellphones before on Amazon and it didn't work out. I really wanted this Blackberry so I tried one last time and I'm tottally happy! It works great, not a refurbished product. I can't complain (except for the obvious things we all know about Blackberrys). I recomended if you want a simple and basic smartphone.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Angel Luis Gonzalez Olivero
Reviews.Content: excellent meets my expectations, not that great, do not hesitate to buy this product. Product quality is very good, bye

Reviews.Title: Hasta ahora bien
Reviews.Author: Karelis
Reviews.Content: Los celulares hasta ahora han resultado muy bien, totalmente nuevos, liberados y con todos sus accesorios en buen estado. No he tenido problemas con los equipos

ProductInfo.Features: The Blackberry Gemini 8520 features a full QWERTY keyboard, Wi-Fi, 2MP camera and Blackberry's own operating software and browser.
ProductInfo.Name: RIM Blackberry Gemini 8520 GSM Quadband Smartphone with 2MP Camera, MP3/AAC/WMA/WAV Player, Card Slot Edge Organizer IMAP/POP3/SMTP/Microsoft Exchange Bluetooth V2.0 (Silver)
